name: flight505-plugins
description: Official marketplace for flight505's Claude Code plugins - Storybook Assistant, Project Planner, and Nano Banana

plugins.name: storybook-assistant
plugins.description: SOTA 2026 Storybook assistant with Vision AI design-to-code, natural language generation, AI-powered accessibility remediation, React Server Components, dark mode generation, and comprehensive testing

plugins.name: claude-project-planner
plugins.description: AI-powered project planning and management assistant for Claude Code with task breakdown, timeline estimation, and progress tracking

plugins.name: nano-banana
plugins.description: AI-powered image and diagram generation using state-of-the-art models via OpenRouter with quality review and iteration
